scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.build:server: cd server && echo "Server build step complete (Node.js doesn't require building)"
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.start:prod: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.test: concurrently "cd client && npm test" "cd server && npm test"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd client && npm run lint" "cd server && npm run lint"
scripts.lint:fix: concurrently "cd client && npm run lint:fix" "cd server && npm run lint:fix"
